item.title: Mark add a quote by Robert M. Pirsig
item.description: "Peace of mind produces right values, right values produce right thoughts. Right thoughts produce right actions and right actions produce work which will be a material reflection for others to see of the serenity at the center of it all." -- Robert M. Pirsig

item.title: Mark add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "The zipper displaces the button and a man lacks just that much time to think while dressing at dawn, a philosophical hour, and thus a melancholy hour." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Mark add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Kindness and a caring mind are two separate qualities. Kindness is manners. It is superficial custom, an acquired practice. Not so the mind. The mind is deeper, stronger, and, I believe, it is far more inconstant." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Mark add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "You got to know your limits. Once is enough, but you got to learn. A little caution never hurt anyone. A good woodsman has only one scar on him. No more, no less." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Mark add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "No. Kindness and a caring mind are two separate qualities. Kindness is manners. It is superficial custom, an acquired practice. Not so the mind. The mind is deeper, stronger and, I believe, it is far more inconstant." -- Haruki Murakami
